short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks websites from listening to paste events

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever felt annoyed when a website restricts your ability to paste text into a form or anywhere on the page? LetMePaste is here to solve that problem. This Chrome extension ensures that any website you visit cannot interfere with or listen to your 'paste' events. This means you can freely copy and paste text, passwords, or any other data without any website stopping you. It's all about giving you back control over a basic function while you browse. 

Install LetMePaste and experience a restriction-free browsing experience!
